Articles.Content:
So when I'm getting a random part failure (as TT-440XL is prone to do as it feels like that decoupler is made of glass), having a replay feature to better analyze the failure and figure out why it's failing would be extremely helpful with building better craft.

I don't mind failing if I have the tools to learn from it so I can make adjustments and end up with something working, but failing and wondering if you're hitting a bug isn't fun and makes me want to just Alt+F4 and go do something else.
